Hero.text: I am passionate about programming and continuous learning, always eager to expand my knowledge and skills to provide effective solutions for my clients.

Services.title: Services
Services.subtitle: Tailored web solutions for your digital success.
Services.description: I develop customized and functional web solutions focused on providing an optimized user experience tailored to each client's needs.

webDesign.title: Web Design
webDesign.description: Development of modern and attractive interfaces that combine aesthetics and functionality for an impactful visual experience.

responsive.title: Fully Responsive
responsive.description: Implementation of adaptive designs that ensure a seamless user experience on any device.

mobileApp.title: Mobile Applications
mobileApp.description: Development of intuitive and high-performance mobile apps that provide a smooth and satisfying experience.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Creation of solid and scalable backend systems that ensure efficient and secure project operation.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.subtitle: Some of my most notable projects.
Projects.description: Explore my latest projects and discover my evolution as a programmer through innovative solutions tailored to each challenge.

lamberti.title: Lamberti Carra Architects
lamberti.description: Website for the architecture firm Lamberti Carra.

sectionDescription.title: Concept
sectionDescription.description: I developed a minimalist and elegant website that reflects the studio's philosophy: 'Architecture as a bridge between ideas and real life'. The design prioritizes visual clarity, narrative fluidity, and a harmonious dialogue between spaces, environment, and time.

technologie_1.title: Next.js + React
technologie_1.description: For optimal performance, fast loading, and modular structure.

technologie_2.title: Framer Motion
technologie_2.description: Subtle and sophisticated animations that guide the user, enhancing the experience without distracting from the content.

technologie_3.title: Minimalist Design
technologie_3.description: Clean typography, neutral color palette, and ample use of white space, highlighting architecture as the protagonist.

technologie_4.title: Descriptive Images
technologie_4.description: High-quality galleries showcasing projects in detail, reinforcing the studio's visual identity.

technologie_5.title: Delicate Interaction
technologie_5.description: Fluid transitions, smooth scroll effects, and microinteractions that add an organic and contemporary touch.

sectionResult.title: Result
sectionResult.description: A digital platform that not only presents the studio's portfolio but evokes its essence: architecture designed to integrate with life, environment, and time. Ideal for clients seeking conceptual clarity and elegance in every detail.

mahalo.title: Mahalo Cabins
mahalo.description: Official website for Mahalo Cabins, located in Villa Rumipal, Córdoba.

sectionDescription.title: Concept
sectionDescription.description: I developed an informative and visually attractive website for Mahalo Cabins, where nature and comfort merge. The design prioritizes immersion in the natural environment, facilitating exploration of the facilities and simplifying the booking process, creating a digital bridge between the lodging experience and potential guests.

technologie_1.title: HTML5 + CSS3 + JavaScript
technologie_1.description: Fundamental base for semantic structure, custom styles, and essential interactivity.

technologie_2.title: AOS (Animate On Scroll)
technologie_2.description: Discreet animations triggered on scroll, improving engagement without overloading the experience.

technologie_3.title: Experience-Oriented Design
technologie_3.description: Focus on visualizing the natural environment, with clear information hierarchy and direct access to main actions.

technologie_4.title: Multimedia Integration
technologie_4.description: Image galleries, immersive videos, and interactive maps showing the entire complex.

technologie_5.title: Integrated Systems
technologie_5.description: Connectors with booking platform and Google Reviews API to display real-time ratings.

sectionResult.title: Result
sectionResult.description: A digital platform that serves as a window to the complex, combining practical information with visually impactful presentation. Visitors can explore the facilities, see real testimonials, and manage bookings in one space, significantly improving conversion and reducing friction in the booking process. The site reflects Mahalo's essence of disconnection and connection with nature.

nike.title: Nike Max Play 2024
nike.description: Official agenda for the Nike Max Play 2024 event in Chile and Peru.

sectionDescription.title: Concept
sectionDescription.description: I developed, in collaboration with Delfin Blaksley, the official digital agenda for Nike Max Play 2024, a project that combines essential functionality with Nike's innovative spirit. The design prioritizes immediate access to event information in Chile and Peru, with a simple yet effective authentication system that keeps content exclusive for attendees, reflecting the brand's dynamic energy through a clean interface and intuitive actions.

technologie_1.title: React + Vite
technologie_1.description: Modern architecture for optimal performance and fast loading, essential for event access.

technologie_2.title: AOS (Animate On Scroll)
technologie_2.description: Strategic microanimations that reinforce Nike's dynamic identity without interfering with usability.

technologie_3.title: Accessibility-Centered Design
technologie_3.description: High-contrast interface and intuitive navigation, optimized for mobile use during the event.

technologie_4.title: Light Authentication System
technologie_4.description: Simplified login mechanism (free user + universal password) that balances security and ease of access.

technologie_5.title: Geo-Specific Content
technologie_5.description: Smart presentation of differentiated agendas and brochures for Chile and Peru in a single implementation.

sectionResult.title: Result
sectionResult.description: A strategic digital tool that served as the nerve center of information during Nike Max Play 2024. Attendees instantly accessed updated agendas and exclusive materials, while Push and Pull agency and Nike obtained a unified platform for both countries. The project demonstrated how simple technical solutions can enhance large-scale physical experiences, maintaining the brand's vibrant essence.

bouquet.title: Bouquet
bouquet.description: Ecommerce for the Coderhouse JavaScript Course

sectionDescription.title: Concept
sectionDescription.description: I developed Bouquet as an academic project for the JavaScript course at Coderhouse, merging my passion for web development with the elegance of the wine world. The design prioritizes a refined user experience, where intuitive navigation and visual product presentation recreate the sophistication of a premium winery, demonstrating how dynamic interfaces can elevate the perception of specialized products.

technologie_1.title: JavaScript ES6+
technologie_1.description: Advanced logic for catalog management, interactive filters, and shopping cart simulation.

technologie_2.title: Modern CSS3
technologie_2.description: Custom styles with fluid animations, CSS variables, and responsive design that adapts elegance to any device.

technologie_3.title: Semantic HTML5
technologie_3.description: Accessible and SEO-friendly structure that hierarchically organizes product information.

technologie_4.title: Premium Product-Oriented UX
technologie_4.description: Navigation patterns that replicate the experience of a physical wine shop, with transitions evoking tasting rituals.

technologie_5.title: Interactive Mockups
technologie_5.description: Complete product presentation system with interactive zoom and technical details organized by categories.

sectionResult.title: Result
sectionResult.description: A functional specialized e-commerce prototype that exceeded academic requirements, demonstrating ability to solve complex UI/UX problems in gourmet product environments. The project validated how well-structured code and conscious design can create value perceptions, providing Coderhouse with a tangible case study for future students. The implementation received special mention for its attention to detail in product-user interaction.

Games.title: Games
Games.subtitle: Some of my favorite games.
Games.description: Explore my favorite games and discover my evolution as a programmer through innovative solutions tailored to each challenge.

fifteenPuzzle.head: Puzzle
fifteenPuzzle.title: Fifteen Puzzle
fifteenPuzzle.description1: Fifteen Puzzle is a classic sliding puzzle game that challenges your logic and problem-solving skills. The goal is to rearrange the numbered tiles from 1 to 15 within a 4x4 grid by strategically moving them until they are in the correct order.
fifteenPuzzle.description2: Initially developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, now uses React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, enhancing its design, optimizing performance, and providing a more dynamic and smooth experience.

Testimonials.title: Testimonials
Testimonials.subtitle: What our clients say.
Testimonials.description: Discover the experiences and opinions of our clients, who share how our solutions have exceeded their expectations and contributed to their projects.

card1.comment: The development team created a fast and easy-to-use web app that exceeded all my expectations. Their professionalism was key.
card1.name: Oscar Biocca

card2.comment: The experience was excellent. Our website is visually appealing and offers flawless navigation. Highly recommended.
card2.name: Kurt Rubinstein

card3.comment: The backend solution they provided is solid and secure. The team's attention to detail is impressive. Great job!
card3.name: Santino Ruzzante

card4.comment: The team delivered a functional and modern web app that has optimized our processes. Great professionalism and dedication.
card4.name: Martín Pascual

card5.comment: They developed an elegant and easy-to-manage website. The result was more than we expected. Very satisfied with their work.
card5.name: Yamila Sayag

card6.comment: The backend development they provided is scalable and robust. A professional service that met all our expectations.
card6.name: Delfin Blaksley

card7.comment: Thanks to the team, our web app is fast and reliable. Their problem-solving ability is unmatched. We highly recommend them.
card7.name: Lucía Hernández

Faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faqs.subtitle: Answers to your most common questions.

1.question: Do you offer maintenance and post-development support services?
1.answer: Yes, I provide ongoing maintenance and support to ensure that the application or website continues to function optimally. This includes security updates, performance improvements, and the implementation of new features.

2.question: Do you have experience working on large projects and collaborating with teams?
2.answer: I have worked on projects of various sizes, from individual applications to complex enterprise platforms. In teams, I use tools like Git, Jira, and Slack to collaborate efficiently with other developers, designers, and project managers.

3.question: Can you integrate APIs and third-party services into my applications?
3.answer: Of course, I have experience integrating external APIs such as payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal), authentication services (OAuth, JWT), and other RESTful or GraphQL APIs to enhance the functionality of applications.

4.question: How long does it take to develop an application or website?
4.answer: The time varies depending on the complexity of the project and its requirements. A basic project can take between 2 to 4 weeks, while a more complex system may require several months. I always provide a detailed plan and estimated timelines after discussing the requirements.

5.question: Do you offer design services or do you only focus on development?
5.answer: While I specialize in development, I collaborate with professional designers to ensure that the products have an attractive and functional design. I also have basic knowledge of tools like Figma and Adobe XD, which allows me to work directly on simple designs.

6.question: What are your rates?
6.answer: My rates depend on the type and complexity of the project. I offer hourly rates or fixed-price budgets based on the specific needs of each client. After an initial consultation, I provide a clear cost breakdown.
